input.sentences: we had a great night out with our friends
we made sure to get in a group picture

output.sentences: It is always good to have a night out with friends.
Glasses of wine enjoyed with friends makes a great outing.
Of course we had to ask the waiter to take our picture.
Josh and another guy had this picture taken.
This picture reminds me of good time with good friends.
